definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: kingship, royalty;—´[[מ]] abs. 1Sa 10:16 + 23 t.;—kingship, kingly office, royalty: 1Sa 10:16, 1Sa 10:25, 1Sa 11:14, 1Sa 18:5, 1Ki 2:15, 1Ki 2:15, 1Ki 2:22, 1Ki 11:35, 1Ch 10:14, Is 34:12; belonging to ´[[י]] Ob:Ob 21, Ps 22:29 (‖ [[וּמשֵׁל בַּגּוֹיִם]]); [[עַל]] ´[[לָכַד מ]] 1Sa 14:47 assume sovereignty over; [[בְּיַד]] ´[[נׇתַן מ]] 2Sa 16:18 give kingship to (subj. ´[[י]]); ´[[ל]] ´[[הֵשִׁיב מ]] 1Ki 12:21 restore kingship to; [[על]] ´[[עָשָׂה מ]] 1Ki 21:7 exercise kingship over; metaph. of Jerus. [[וַתִּחְלְחִי לִמְלוּכָה]] Ez Eze 16:13 (del. LXX Co); ´[[עִיר הַמ]] 2Sa 12:26 = royal city; cf. ´[[כִּסֵּא הַמ]] 1Ki 1:46; ´[[זֶרַע הַמ]] 2Ki 25:25 so Je 41:1, Ez Eze 17:13, Da 1:3; ´[[חְנִו֠ף מ]] Is 62:3 (‖[[עֲטֶרֶת תִּפְאֶרֶת]]).
